CustomField.description: Check off this box if a Meeting has no numbers associated to any of the "number of meeting" fields. This means that 0 are attributed so we are to assume that at least 1 basic meeting has been applied to that event. Review "BM Data Bank" google sheet or contact Sam Alden/System Admin any questions.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Check off this box if a Meeting has no numbers associated to any of the "number of meeting" fields. This means that 0 are attributed so we are to assume that at least 1 basic meeting has been applied to that event. Review "BM Data Bank" google sheet or contact Sam Alden/System Admin any questions.
CustomField.label: Number of Basic Meeting Assumption?
